item.description: Our March 2011 meeting's topic will be "Reboot!", and it's a purely social event.  Join us at Richter's on Chapel St. in New Haven for a completely ad-hoc, free-form, hang-out and geek-out session.  There will be no formal discussion or presentation for this meeting, but the SCOSUG board members will all be interested in hearing from the group's members about what kinds of topics and events they'd like to see happen for future meetings.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for t-shirts or signs with Linux penguins, BSD devils, or other similar open source mascots. Or just listen for the word "kernel". We're probably not that hard to miss.
item.why: SCOSUG's been fairly dormant for a while. But, now that the weather's getting a little nicer, we're trying to break free from our self-imposed hibernation, and start having regular meetings again.

group.name: Southern CT Open Source Users Group (SCOSUG)

item.name: The SCOSUG Reboot Meeting!
